overview_of_class:
Course Objective: To provide a solid introduction to the methods of modern time series analysis. The main focus will be modeling and forecasting time series using linear ARMA models. Nonlinear GARCH models, which are popular for financial time series, will also be discussed.

Prerequisites/Corequisites: Statistics 320-1 and Statistics 350
name: Applied Time Series Modeling and Forecasting
subject: STAT
